scripts.electron:dev: npm run electron:compile && concurrently -n "vite,electron" -c "blue,green" "npm run dev --workspace frontend" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 --timeout 30000 && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: npm run electron:compile && npm run build --workspace frontend && electron-forge package
scripts.electron:make: npm run electron:compile && npm run build --workspace frontend && electron-forge make
scripts.electron:make:all: npm run electron:compile && npm run build --workspace frontend && electron-forge make --platform=win32,darwin,linux
